activity_id: Integer: Required: The normalized identifier of the activity that triggered the event. 0: Unknown, 1: Log, 2: Collect, 99: Other
activity_name: String: Optional: The event activity name, as defined by the activity_id.

actor.user: String: Recommended: The user that initiated the activity or the user context from which the activity was initiated.

category_name: String: Optional: The event category name, as defined by category_uid value: Discovery.
category_uid: Integer: Required: The category unique identifier of the event. 5: Discovery
class_name: String: Optional: The event class name, as defined by class_uid value: Device Inventory Info.
class_uid: Integer: Required: The unique identifier of a class. A class describes the attributes available in an event. 5001: Device Inventory Info
count: Integer: Optional: The number of times that events in the same logical group occurred during the event Start Time to End Time period.
